entities.name: regulus black
entities.description: Regulus Black is mentioned as the younger brother of Sirius Black and a Death Eater. He died fifteen years previously.

relationships.description: Sirius mentions that Regulus was his younger brother.
Regulus joined the Death Eaters, which is a group led by Voldemort.
Sirius mentions that Regulus was his younger brother.
Sirius' parents thought Voldemort had the right idea about purifying the Wizarding race.
